title: Shingles
description: Usually you get shingles on your chest and tummy, but it can appear on your face, eyes and genitals.

value.caption: The shingles rash appears as red blotches on your skin, on one side of your body only. A rash on both the left and right of your body is unlikely to be shingles.
value.alt: A shingles rash on the shoulder

value.caption: The blotches become itchy blisters which ooze fluid. A few days later the blisters dry out and scab.
The rash can form a band that only appears on one side of your body. The skin remains painful until after the rash has gone.
